name: California Gold Rush
overview: Can YOU help Jake become rich, help him peg his claim, dodge the arrows, avoid the tomahawks, and plant the Dynamite in just the right place? . . . YOU CAN!! Yippee. Released as part of Stonysoft #0398. This here's Prospector Jake, I sure am havin' one helluva time tryin' to peg ma claim with those damned Injuns a hootin' and a hollerin' alI over this territory. Ma job gets harder as I move from one Gold Field to another. I know, that is me an' ma stubborn ornery ol' Mule here know of 24 rich an' I mean rich seams of pure Gold. All it needs to make this here ol' critter happy is that you help me peg every doggone last one of them claims.
